champ.champInfo:
SK "KANKU" Cup. Organizer of SK "KANKU"

The chief judge of the competition is S.A. Mutin. (5th dan, Lviv).
The deputy chief judge of the competition â€” Havrilets T.S. (4th dan, Lviv)

Venue of the competition: Lviv-Vynnyky, str. Khmelnytskogo, 9B

The competition is held on April 22-23, 2023

Regulations of the competition

April 22:

  • 08:30-09:00 judges' meeting
  • 09:00 ceremonial opening of the competition
  • 09.30-13.00 qualifying matches in the KUMITE section
  • 13:00-13:30 break
  • 13.30-16.00 continuation of fights in the KUMITE section
  • 16:00-17:30 awarding of prize winners

April 23:

  • 08:30-09:00 judges' meeting
  • 09:00 ceremonial opening of the competition
  • 09.30-13.00 qualifying matches in the KUMITE section
  • 13:00-13:30 break
  • 13.30-16.00 continuation of fights in the KUMITE section
  • 16:00-17:30 awarding of prize winners

Competition rules

Competitions are held separately for male and female participants. Helmets according to the standards of the current Rules will be provided by the competition organizers. Helmets must be red (AKA) or white (GRAY).

Competitions are held separately for participants with qualifications: 0-9 Kyu, 8-7 Kyu, 6 Kyu and more. Duels in the categories are held according to the circular or Olympic systems.

Boys categories:

  • 2017-2017: -20.0, -25.0, -30.0, -35.0, -40.0, 40+
  • 2015-2016: -20.0, -25.0, -30.0, -35.0, -40.0, 40+
  • 2013-2014: -25.0, -30.0, -35.0, -40.0, 40.0+
  • 2011-2012: -35.0, -40.0, -45.0, -50.0, 50.0+
  • 2009-2010: -40.0, -45.0, -50.0, -55.0, -60.0, -65.0, 65.0+

Girls categories:

  • 2017-2017: -20.0, -25.0, -30.0, -35.0, -40.0, 40+
  • 2015-2016: -20.0, -25.0, -30.0, -35.0, -40.0, 40+
  • 2013-2014: -25.0, -30.0, -35.0, -40.0, 40.0+
  • 2011-2012: -35.0, -40.0, -45.0, -50.0, 50.0+
  • 2009-2010: -40.0, -45.0, -50.0, -55.0, -60.0, -65.0, 65.0+

Match time

  • 2009-2017: 1 min., 1 min., weigh-in, 1 min.

Regulations

  • The difference for victory is 2.5 kg, or more according to the results of weighing when passing the mandate commission.
  • The organizing committee may make the following changes to the Regulations on these competitions in case of insufficient participants in some categories for quality competition:
  • combine or add weight and age categories;
  • to hold competitions in specified weight categories in a circular and mixed way.
